name: playwright-e2e-bdd-framework
description: Playwright E2E BDD Framework with TypeScript and Cucumber

scripts.test:ui: cucumber-js tests/features --tags "@ui" --config cucumber.local.js && npm run report
scripts.test:api: cucumber-js tests/features --tags "@api" --config cucumber.local.js && npm run report
scripts.test:smoke: cucumber-js tests/features --tags "@smoke" --config cucumber.local.js && npm run report
scripts.test:regression: cucumber-js tests/features --tags "@regression" --config cucumber.local.js && npm run report
scripts.test:all: cucumber-js tests/features --config cucumber.local.js && npm run report
